unnormalised: Subsidy programs in India require rigorous evaluation. Schemes like those targeting farmers in Punjab necessitate careful monitoring to avoid unintended consequences. Evidence-based research, perhaps leveraging data from institutions like the IIMs, is crucial. Transparent audits must assess the true beneficiaries. Are deserving families, celebrating Onam, truly uplifted? We need data beyond aggregate Rs. figures, down to the village level. This strengthens policy, ensuring efficient resource allocation and preventing leakages.
